attributes.action: Death by dangerous driving should be changed to a charge of murder !!
attributes.additional_details:
The sentences people get for this crime are a joke and nowhere near long enough. The family of people who have died in this way are getting no justice for their loved ones. It won't bring people back to their families but it might deter others from driving like idiots if
 they know the sentence is going to reflect the crime !!
attributes.background: If somebody kills a person either through speeding or any other motoring offence, that person should be charged with murder not death by dangerous driving

rejection.details:
We think these petitions would have the same effect:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575522
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578391

Charging decisions are a matter for the CPS, not the Government and Parliament.
